thread.title: Twitter Clowns On President George H.W. Bush For Ditching The Inauguration & Showing Up To The Super Bowl — See The Best Tweets!
thread.title_full: Twitter Clowns On President George H.W. Bush For Ditching The Inauguration & Showing Up To The Super Bowl — See The Best Tweets!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Twitter Clowns On President George H.W. Bush For Ditching The Inauguration & Showing Up To The Super Bowl — See The Best Tweets!
text:
Former President George H.W. Bush and wife Barbara Bush were the guests of honor at the Super Bowl Sunday!
Following their hospitalizations in January, it was great to see them both looking healthy and happy!
Related: The Best Super Bowl Commercials 
The 92-year-old even had the honor of doing the coin toss that kicked off the game! But even better than seeing the Bush duo, there were all the reactions to their appearance.
Twitter cracked us up as usual! See the best tweets (below)! 
George Bush couldn't come to the inauguration but my nigga front and center at the Super Bowl LMA 
— ba$ky yacht (@baskgod) February 5, 2017 
When George Bush has more rushing yards than the Patriots #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/MbtGsKhZ0y 
— #WeTheNorth (@_RaptorsNation_) February 6, 2017 
I love George Bush
Can you come to the inauguration?
Bush: no, too sick
Can you do the #Superbowl coin toss
Bush: I'll be there #SuperBowl 
— G.S RANA (@Ranabe4u) February 5, 2017 
George Bush IS Rose throwing the Heart of the Ocean
— Jaclyn Swartz (@JaclynSwartz) February 5, 2017 
George Bush trying to make it to the coin toss #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/McJVapq9ir 
— Cadillac Jones (@Domenic_Dunegan) February 5, 2017 
Trump: So George Bush can attend the Super Bowl but not my inauguration. Sad! I want to see a doctor's excuse
Barbara Bush: pic.twitter.com/lMAKcPIcOf 
— . (@ktgonkt) February 5, 2017 
I was rooting for Atlanta but I should've known from the moment they wheeled out George Bush out it was gonna be a Republican Super Bowl.
— LateNightProgramming (@KingThelonious) February 6, 2017 
The Patriots should consider wheeling George Bush Sr back out onto the field. He'd be much faster in the pocket than Tom Brady. #SuperBowl 
— Rich Goeckel (@RichGoeckel) February 6, 2017 
Great-Grandaddy George Bush was finna die 2wks ago but was just out on the #SuperBowl field talmbout "gimme the coin."
— La Peebz. (@thepbg) February 5, 2017 
So George Bush Sr. wasn't healthy enough to attend the inauguration but is healthy enough to go to the Super Bowl. Right.
— Hurricane Matthew (@Sikorkasaurus) February 1, 2017 
[ Image via Fox ]
